price: Sε wobisa wͻn sε: “Hwan na Ɔbͻͻ wͻn a, wͻbεka sε: “Nyankopͻn”. Adεn na afei wͻretwe wͻn ho (firi Nokorε no ho)?
arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَهُمۡ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqahum layaqūlunna al-lahu fa-annā yu'fakūna
